content.title: Around Town
content.heading: Traveling to Austin for a Conference or Family?
content.p: There are a number of restaurants within a few miles of Calvary Austin. Here are just a few of the many choices:

1.Bennigan's (512-451-7953) 7604 N. IH-35
2.Ninfa's (512-832-1833) 214 E. Anderson Ln.
3.Denny's (512-453-3617) 7100 N. IH-35
4.Chili's Grill (512-454-8747) 7629 N. IH-35
5.I-HOP (512-452-2253) 8702 Research Blvd. (Hwy 183)
6.Pappasitos and Pappadeaux (512-452-9363) 6319 N. IH-35
7.Olive Garden (512-459-0701) 8833 Burnet Rd.
8.Lone Star Cafe (512-451-9675) 9070 Research Blvd.
9.Chuy's (512-836-3218) 10520 N. Lamar Blvd.
There are a number of hotels within a few miles of Calvary Austin. Here are just a few of the many choices:

A.Best Western Atrium North (512-339-7311) 7928 Gessner Drive, 1 block west of US 183 and IH-35
B.Budget Inn (512-837-7900) 9016 N. IH-35
C.Courtyard by Marriott (512-458-2340) 5660 N. IH-35
D.Doubletree Austin (512-454-3737) 6505 N. IH-35
E.Drury Inn and Suites North (512-467-9500) IH-35 and St. Johns
F.Embassy Suites (512-454-1386) 5901 N. IH-35
G.La Quinta Inn North (512-452-9401) 7100 North IH-35
H.Red Lion Austin (512-323-5466) 6121 North IH-35
I.Red Roof Inn North (512-835-2200) 8210 North IH-35
